Dolar AS Sedikit Lagi Tinggalkan Rp 14.000
04 Nov 2019, 02:53 by Zulfi Suhendra


Foto: Dolar AS/

Jakarta - Nilai tukar dolar Amerika Serikat (AS) terhadap rupiah pagi ini berada di level Rp 14.005. Demikian dikutip dari data perdagangan Reuters, Senin (4/11/2019).Rupiah terhadap dolar hari ini tercatat lebih kuat dibanding posisi penutupan perdagangan pada Jumat kemarin yang ada di level Rp 14.055. Dolar AS dalam dua pekan terakhir tercatat bergerak stabil di bawah level Rp 14.100. Secara point to point dibandingkan setahun yang lalu, mata uang Paman Sam bergerak di rentang Rp 13.885-15.198.Gubernur BI Perry Warjiyo menjelaskan nilai tukar rupiah ke depan masih ada potensi penguatan. "Sebetulnya itu menunjukkan masih ada ruang bagi rupiah untuk lebih menguat dan terbukti beberapa kali di bawah 14.000," kata Perry di Gedung BI, Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).Dia mengungkapkan, penguatan bisa terjadi karena angka inflasi yang rendah dan prospek ekonomi yang baik sehingga kredibilitas ekonomi Indonesia terjaga dan pasar nyaman dengan kebijakan-kebijakan yang ada.Perry menyebutkan, pergerakan nilai tukar rupiah terhadap dolar AS ini dipengaruhi oleh sejumlah korporasi yang membutuhkan dolar dan kemudian meningkatkan pembelian baik impor atau untuk pembayaran. US Dollar Slightly Leave Rp. 14,000
04 Nov 2019, 02:53 by Zulfi Suhendra


Photo: US Dollar /

Jakarta - The exchange rate of the United States dollar (US) against the rupiah this morning is at the level of Rp 14,005. As quoted from Reuters trade data, Monday (11/04/2019). The rupiah against the dollar today was stronger than the closing position of the trade on Friday which was at the level of Rp 14,055. The US dollar in the last two weeks was recorded moving stable below the level of Rp 14,100. On a point-to-point basis compared to a year ago, Uncle Sam's currency moved in the range of Rp 13,885-15,198. BI Governor Perry Warjiyo explained that the rupiah exchange rate in the future was still potential for strengthening. "Actually it shows that there is still room for the rupiah to strengthen and is proven to be several times below 14,000," Perry said at the BI Building, Jakarta, Friday (1/11/2019). He revealed, the strengthening could occur due to low inflation rates and good economic prospects so that the credibility of the Indonesian economy is maintained and the market is comfortable with existing policies. Jerry said, the movement of the rupiah against the US dollar is influenced by a number of corporations that need dollars and then increase purchases either imported or for payment.
